Quickstrike:





The shots from Ramhorn hit the back of Quickstrike's legs, sending him hard 
to the ground. He dropped Dark Mouse and screamed. He went to drag himself. 
He was so close to the base. He reached towards Dark Mouse. He rolled to his 
knees in great pain. He lifted his left foot, trying to stand, but up fell 
back onto his chest.

He looked back to see Ramulus and Ramhorn. He groaned, then commanded, 
"Auto-guns--" He ducked as he saw three bright balls of fire from a auto-gun 
fire at Ramhorn.

He rolled his head. "Get 'er inside!" he said to Double Punch. "Don't stall, 
don't let them Maxie's get 'er." After that, he lifted his chest. "Beast 
mode." He transformed. His lumbering claws were a mess, one twisted and both 
singed. "Flank me, dang it!" he called to Scorponok. "Flank me!" He 
skittered to the ramp of the ship.
